steps.text: Line bottom of 15” x 10” jelly roll pan with waxed paper.  Prepare cake mix and pour evenly into prepared pan.
Bake about 20 minutes, or until cake is golden brown and springs back when touched.
Cool on wire rack for 15 minutes.  Lay clean kitchen towel on flat surface.
Sift 1/4 cup powdered sugar over towel; invert cake on top of sugar.  Carefully peel off waxed paper.  Starting at short end, roll cake up with towel.  Cool 30 minutes, seam side down, on wire rack.
While cake is cooling, remove frozen yogurt from freezer to soften.
Carefully unroll cake.  Using a rubber spatula, place spoonfuls of frozen yogurt on top of cake; spread to edges with table knife.
Reroll filled cake; cover tightly with plastic wrap.  Freeze at least 3 hours or overnight.
To serve: remove from freezer and let sit 15 minutes. Dust with powdered sugar.  Cut into slices with serrated knife.
